name: Star
description: Star is where founders raise via public token sales, live on stream. It is a fundraising platform, a token launchpad, and a livestreaming site, all in one. Star hosts livestreamed fundraising rounds, where startups get to pitch curated panels of experts while actively raising. Brilliant ideas can come from anywhere. Star is building a meritocratic platform where those ideas get a fair shot at funding from a global community eager to back the next big thing.
